member.name: COLORSCHEME
member.summary: Contains information for the drawing of buttons in a toolbar or rebar.

member.name: COLORSCHEME.dwSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: COLORSCHEME.clrBtnHighlight
member.summary: The COLORREF value that represents the highlight color of the buttons. UseCLR_DEFAULT for the default highlight color.

member.name: COLORSCHEME.clrBtnShadow
member.summary: The COLORREF value that represents the shadow color of the buttons. UseCLR_DEFAULT for the default shadow color.
